Locations Library cards

    Research begins with Randquest - a collection of electronic resources for school, health, business and much more!

    Start Your Search

    Supplemental home learning resources for parents, caregivers and families.

Locations

Randolph County Public Libraries cultivate a thriving community by nurturing readers, empowering learners, and creating connections. We have several branches throughout the community. Find your nearest branch below:

  • Asheboro Public Library
    201 Worth Street
    Asheboro, NC 27203
    (336) 318-6800
